channel.title: Minecraft server questions etc
channel.description:
Well, I'm sure theres a topic about this somewhere.But I'm going to make a new one for the purpose of adding something extra. I recently started playing minecraft, though it hogs all my RAM it's still playable. I was going to pay for hosting of a minecraft server and was wondering how many people would actually be willing to play from this community (It'd be nice to see familiar faces).
I was also wondering what specs I should be looking for to host a minecraft server.
Thank you.

item.title: Minecraft server questions etc
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Liquid Magic:

did they ever add online survival

Multiplayer is basically singleplayer with added friends.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Liquid Magic:

did they ever add online survival

Yeah there’s monsters in multiplayer now. It’s getting new updates each week as well.

item.title: Minecraft server questions etc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:4, topic:375286”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=471241.msg3446478#msg3446478 date=1293475004]

I’d play for sure. <3 minecraft.

As for specs not sure. I bet Graham would know.

I’m not looking for a hundred player server but a small community based minecraft server where everybody can get a long, so I don’t want to go over the top hosting wise.
[/quote]
pvp?[/quote]

I intend to have a discussion regarding what people want/don’t want in the server. I’m honestly not bothered I like pretty much everything no matter what it is.

Anyway, if anyone wants to discuss, feel free to add me:

Read full topic
